#  Uplift Your Life with Compression from JOBST®

____

  *   *   *   * 

## JOBST ActiveWear

The comfortable compression socks for active living

  * Cushioning

Cushioned foot part provides comfort

  * Moisture Management

Keeps the patients skin dry and comfortable

  * Soft Touch

Blend of soft yarns

## Accept cookies for a more personalized experience!

By clicking “Accept All Cookies” you agree to the storing of cookies on your
device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our
marketing efforts. By "Accepting Necessary Cookies" the website will work but
without the above mentioned enhancements.

Manage your choices Accept Necessary Cookies Accept All Cookies

## Privacy Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your
browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you,
your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as
you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but
it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your
right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on
the different category headings to find out more and change our default
settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience
of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
More information

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched
off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by
you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy
preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block
or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then
work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

View Vendor Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and
personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose
services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then
some or all of these services may not function properly.

View Vendor Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure
and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are
the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All
information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If
you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our
site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

View Vendor Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They
may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show
you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal
information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet
device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted
advertising.

View Vendor Details‎

#  JOBST® Elvarex

Jobst USA>Products>Medical Compression>Lymphology>Custom Daytime
Garments>JOBST Elvarex

#### Compression for those who value reliability

JOBST Elvarex® is an established compression garment that provides effective
lymphedema management where firm support is needed. To provide comfort and
control, all JOBST Elvarex® products are custom-made to match your
measurements, which ensures strong and flexible support for your day-to-day
life.

#### JOBST Elvarex®

  * Strong Hold: Firm hold for effective lymphedema management
  * Breathable: Special knitting structure allows air to pass, to enhance wearing comfort 
  * Functional Zone: Optional Functional Zone for greater wearing comfort and flexibility
  * Micro- Massage: The knitted fabric helps with exerting a micro-massage effect on the skin during movement

**Even more freedom: functional zone for greater wearing comfort**

Additional Functional Zones can be knitted into the garments. This patented
Functional Zone is a uniquely knitted two-layer construction created from soft
and particularly elastic yarns. It reduces cutting in and wrinkling to provide
further comfort while retaining effective compression. The Functional Zone
also provides greater mobility and support around joints, according to your
personal needs.

 **Compression with expression: color up your life**

JOBST Elvarex® products are now available in a wider variety of colors to
complement your personality: Whether you are looking for something to match
your favorite outfit or provide a color contrast, you can now enjoy trusted
JOBST Elvarex® quality in three additional colors to help you coordinate
perfectly. With the new ruby red and dark blue, you can now choose from a
wider range of elegant tones that go perfectly with just about any outfit.

  
JOBST Elvarex® offers a great assortment to meet your individual needs.
Discover our JOBST Elvarex® products here.
